alert.note: Alert for Morrow (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 20 at 8:11PM EDT until July 20 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN RICHLAND...SOUTH CENTRAL ASHLAND...NORTHERN MORROW AND NORTHERN KNOX COUNTIES... At 810 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Lexington, or 7 miles northeast of Mount Gilead, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Mount Gilead, Lexington, Loudonville, Fredericktown, Cardington, Bellville, Danville, Chesterville, Waterford, Butler, Edison, Gann, North Liberty and Shauck. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
